com.slytechs.library

ע������ Library


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Library
    The Library requirements and helper information. This annotation is used to make sure that proper prerequisite classes and their prereqs are loaded. The class who's 'required' prerequisites are not loaded properly will also fail to load. The class who's 'optional' prerequisites are not loaded will continue to load, but is expected to provide a mechanism which allows checks to be made, which parts of the classes API are not accessible due to 'optional' requirements missing.

    This is primarily used with providing support for multiple versions of an API. The optional parts of the API are determined at runtime.

    ����:
    Sly Technologies, Inc.

      (Optional) name of system library that this class is dependent on.

      • optional

        public abstract java.lang.String[] optional
        Optional dependencies. The class will load successfully but parts of its API may not be accessible due to optional dependencies missing. The class should provide a mechanism which will provide information about which parts of the API are not available.
        ����:
        the class[] array of classes which will be loaded ahead of this class
        Ĭ��ֵ:

        public abstract java.lang.String[] optionalNative

      • preload

        public abstract java.lang.Class<?>[] preload
        (Optional) name of system library that this class is dependent on. The system library (shared native library), will first be loaded along with any required and optional prerequisites. The library is loaded using normal
        ����:
        the name of the system library System.loadLibrary(String) call. In addition to loading the library, the library's partial symbol table is read and matched up with native methods in the class.
        Ĭ��ֵ:
        {}
